overview: "An Introduction to David Lynch" is a featurette originally released in the 2001 DVD release, Twin Peaks: The First Season.  It features interviews with Catherine E. Coulson, Charles Ramirez-Borg, Lesli Linka Glatter, Miguel Ferrer, Michael J. Anderson, Kyle MacLachlan, Duwayne Dunham, Sheryl Lee, Peggy Lipton, and Richard Beymer, each discussing the filmmaking processes and methods of Twin Peaks co-creator David Lynch.
title: An Introduction to David Lynch
